title: Episode 27: Mark Bittman
description: Cathy hosted Mark Bittman of the NY Times column “The Minimalist”. Mark discusses his writing methods, how industrial food contributes to global warming, and why his column keeps him honest.
author: info@heritageradionetwork.org (Heritage Radio Network)
